confirmEmailUpdate.subject: Confirm Email Update
confirmEmailUpdate.subtitle: Please confirm your email address.
confirmEmailUpdate.instructions: To confirm your new email address for getnative, please click the button below.
confirmEmailUpdate.footer: Didn't expect to receive an email from us? Please let us know so we can fix the problem.

deleteAccountReason.subject: Deleted Account
deleteAccountReason.description: {email} has left getnative. Here's what they had to say:
deleteAccountReason.footer: Didn't expect to receive an email from us? Please let us know so we can fix the problem.

emailUpdateSuccess.subject: Email Updated Successfully
emailUpdateSuccess.message: Your email address for getnative has been successfully updated.
emailUpdateSuccess.footer: Didn't expect to receive an email from us? Please let us know so we can fix the problem.

errors.JWT: An error occurred while processing JWT
errors.UserMissing: No user with this email exists
errors.ResourceNotFound: No resource was found for the given conditions
errors.ForeignKeyConstraintError: Failed to take the specified action on the requested resource due to foreign key constraint
errors.MetadataMissing: No metadata was provided in the request
errors.MetadataFormat: The provided metadata is not parsable JSON

notifyEmailUpdate.subject: Notification Of Email Update
notifyEmailUpdate.message: Your email address for getnative has been updated to {updatedEmail}. This email address will no longer receive messages from getnative. If you think this is a mistake, please contact us immediately.
notifyEmailUpdate.footer: Didn't expect to receive an email from us? Please let us know so we can fix the problem.

passwordUpdated.subject: Password Updated
passwordUpdated.title: Password Updated
passwordUpdated.message-1: Your password for signing in to getnative was recently changed. If you did this yourself, then there's nothing to worry about.
passwordUpdated.message-2: If you did not make this change, please notify us.
passwordUpdated.message-3: Either way, feel free to reach out with any questions you might have. We're here to help.
passwordUpdated.footer: Didn't expect to receive an email from us? Please let us know so we can fix the problem.

registrationEmailConfirmed.subject: Email Address Confirmed
registrationEmailConfirmed.title: Email Address Confirmed
registrationEmailConfirmed.message: Thank you for signing up with getnative! Your email address has successfully been confirmed.
registrationEmailConfirmed.footer: Didn't expect to receive an email from us? Please let us know so we can fix the problem.

welcome.subject: Welcome to getnative!
welcome.title: You're almost done!
welcome.instructionsLineOne: Please click the below button to verify your email address.
welcome.instructionsLineTwo: Thank you for signing up with getnative.
welcome.copyright: Copyright Â© 2017 getnative. All rights reserved.
welcome.footer: Didn't expect to receive an email from us? Please let us know.
